definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: Of course syncopation and blues are only part of the jazz picture.
sentences.chinese: 當然，切分音和藍調只是爵士的一部分。

sentences.english: I play country, reggae, jam, rock, acoustic and blues.
sentences.chinese: 我玩的國家，雷鬼，果醬，岩石，水聲和藍調。

sentences.english: Sample some barbecue and enjoy live blues music during the two day event.
sentences.chinese: 在這兩天裏面參加一些篝火晚會和享受一下藍調音樂。

sentences.english: They play the blues like nobody's business.
sentences.chinese: 他們演奏藍調的技巧無人能敵。

sentences.english: Yeah, you know, you get people on the harmonica playing blues.
sentences.chinese: 是的，你可以看到有人用口琴吹奏藍調音樂。

sentences.english: My favorite music genre is blues.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜歡的音樂種類是藍調。

sentences.english: Prewar Blues is country-blues recorded before World War II.
sentences.chinese: 戰前藍調主要是指在二戰前錄製的鄉村藍調。

sentences.english: Prewar Blues is country-blues recorded before World War II.
sentences.chinese: 戰前藍調主要是指在二戰前錄製的鄉村藍調。

sentences.english: Alan describes the songs they chose for the collection as " bluesy , reflective and melancholy."
sentences.chinese: 稱這首專輯中他們選的歌是藍調的，沉思的和憂鬱的。

sentences.english: Sure. You know Travelin' Blues, right?
sentences.chinese: 當然。你會旅行藍調，對嗎？

sentences.english: Blues, Country and Soul Mix in Memphis, Tennessee.
sentences.chinese: 藍調，鄉村音樂和靈魂樂融于田納西州，孟菲斯。

sentences.english: This is a musical theatrical revue showcasing pop standards, including rock & roll and rhythm & blues songs.
sentences.chinese: 這齣音樂劇展示美國通俗歌曲流派如搖滾樂及藍調。

sentences.english: Before the Second World Warthe American exported jazz and the blues.
sentences.chinese: 在二戰前美國出口血雨腥風爵士樂和藍調。

sentences.english: The average blues song has a repeating 8 or 12-measure melody.
sentences.chinese: 一般的藍調歌曲有八到十二小節的旋律在反覆。

sentences.english: "Battery Kinzie" from "Helplessness Blues" is a good example.
sentences.chinese: “電池坎齊”，從“無奈藍調”是一個很好的例子。

definition: type of opera from Taiwan and Fujian
unplugged (of rock musicians performing on acoustic instruments)
